chats.message: 우리의 색은 gray and blue 엄지손가락으로 말풍선을 띄워
엄지손가락으로 말풍선을 띄워
띄어쓰기없이보낼게사랑인것같애
백만송이 장미꽃을 나랑 피워볼래?
꽃잎의 색은 우리 마음 가는 대로 칠해 시들 때도 예쁘게
하핫
히히
I just wanna be the one, but to you we're already done. Tell me, why'd you have to hit and run me?
Am I the story that's sad and true?
You had to be the one to let me down to color me blue.
Hate to see you with someone new. I'll put a curse on her and you. Ain't no looking back, now you're dead and gone. My love is gone too.
